faqs.question: What settings and update options are available?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://i.imgur.com/mcRBg7W.png[/image]

### Features:
- Auto updater (checks daily)
- Development version installation
- Development version auto-updates

[info]Dev version includes recent bug fixes and beta features, updated frequently based on GitHub issues and Discord feedback[/info]

### Additional Settings:
- Remove Rigid Bodies and Join Global option
- Custom export locations
- Translation preferences
